      • createButton

        private javax.swing.JButton createButton(java.lang.String text,
                                         java.lang.String ac,
                                         java.awt.Color fg,
                                         java.awt.Color bg,
                                         javax.swing.Action handler)
        Creates a button and sets the text, action command, foreground color, background color, and registers (adds) an ActionListener to process the events generated by the button.
        Parameters:
        text - button text
        ac - button action command
        fg - foreground color
        bg - background color
        handler - ActionListener of button
        Returns:
        JButton
